name: Nature's Bounty
description:
Plants strike back! Fight against pollution gremlins and reclaim your grassy slice of home. Control and shoot with mouse (controller kinda works in browser) Spiky pickups give ammo, pluses give health. View approximate ammo on the gauge on the gun. When the score stops going up the game is over, refresh to restart.

Done for https://itch.io/jam/prejamskirmish2020. Originally we wanted enemies to drop sludge to block of parts of a [arena-type] map to make a map that continued to get more difficult to strategize around as waves spawned. Maybe later!

Art: HappyHead

Code: Budjmt
